name: SCREAMBALL
description:
What's more "out of control" than screaming at a pinball table?

Control pinball with your voice and get a higher score based on the unique words you use while screaming into your microphone.

Hold a scream to increase the launch power, then speak words loudly to trigger the flippers. You can increase your vocab modifier by speaking words at any time, but don't lose track of the ball!

I didn't have time to do any audio, but honestly it kind of makes it even funnier when all you can hear is your own mad ramblings. Enjoy!
